Notes: The programmatic scope of the museum is to improve understanding of how the African American sruggle for civil rights contributed to the transformation of the American society through our exhibit and collections. The ACRI will guide you through the Movement of the 50's and 60's, followed by the successful ending of our triumphs in "Everyday Life", and ending with a rousing finale that may include the renown Freedom Singers, performances by ASU and Darton fine arts departments, storytelling and other theatrical and musical performances from guest across the country.
